channel.title: Data Labels on Will Carcamo
channel.description: Recent content in Data Labels on Will Carcamo

item.title: Special ggplot2 Variables
item.description: Data Visualization in R & Labels I often treat building data visualizations in R as a fun puzzle. Prior to learning how to use ggplot2, I would do all of my graphs in excel. Making eye catching graphs in excel is often easier and quicker (especially if you follow Stephanie Evergreen). One feature that I really enjoy in excel is the ease of adding/removing data point labels and re-positioning them with a mouse to get them exactly where I want them, but excel is a tool designed by others for general use and has its own limitations.
